Testcase AlwaysSwitchPerspectiveOption of Monitor.UI.ImportLog failed due to ClassNotFoundException.

Class MonitorUIImportLog is not in package org.eclipse.hyades.use.cases.auto.profiling.logging. This class belongs to package org.eclipse.tptp.auto.profiling.logging.

Please update the testcase with the same.
